feed.title: Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:08 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 10.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 10.5°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 54 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: ESE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain or ice pellets beginning overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to rain showers at times heavy in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Local rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to 13 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
